wikitext.*:
Here listed are the ''major'' three-volume '''UK editions''' of '''''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'''''.

==1954-1980==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="78px" heights="125px">
File:The Lord of the Rings 1954-v1.png|1954-55
File:The Lord of the Rings 1954-v2.png|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1955-v3.png|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1960-v1.gif|1960
File:The Lord of the Rings 1960-v2.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1960-v3.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1964-v0.gif|1963
File:The Lord of the Rings 1964-v0.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1964-v0.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1966-v1.gif|1966
File:The Lord of the Rings 1966-v2.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1966-v3.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1973-v1.gif|1973
File:The Lord of the Rings 1973-v2.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1973-v3.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1974-v1.gif|1974
File:The Lord of the Rings 1974-v2.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1974-v3.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1976-v1.gif|1976
File:The Lord of the Rings 1976-v2.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1976-v3.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1979-v1.gif|1979
File:The Lord of the Rings 1979-v2.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1979-v3.gif|
</gallery>
* [[1954]]-[[1955]]: [[George Allen & Unwin]], hardcover, ISBN none - ('''First edition''', cover based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s design)
* [[1960]]: George Allen & Unwin for Readers Union, hardcover, ISBN none
* [[1963]]: 1955 first edition, 13th impression, issued as a slipcased deluxe edition in 1964
* [[1966]]: [[George Allen & Unwin]], hardcover, ISBN 0048230456, ISBN 0048230464, ISBN 0048230472 - ('''Second edition''')
** [[1973]]: 1966 second edition, 7th impression
* [[1974]]: [[Unwin Books]], paperback, ISBN 0048231126, ISBN 0048231134, ISBN 0048231142 - (cover art by J.R.R. Tolkien)
** [[1976]]: [[Unwin Paperbacks]], 1974 paperback edition, 4th impression
* [[1979]]: [[Unwin Paperbacks]], paperback, ISBN 004823155X, ISBN 0048231568, ISBN 0048231576 - ('''Third edition''')

==1980-1990==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="78px" heights="125px">
File:The Lord of the Rings 1981-v1.gif|1981
File:The Lord of the Rings 1981-v2.gif|
File:The Lord of the Rings 1981-v3.gif|

File:The Lord of the Rings 1990pb-v3.gif|
</gallery>
* [[1981]]: [[Unwin Paperbacks]], paperback, ISBN 0048231851, ISBN 004823186X, ISBN 0048231878 - ('''Fourth edition''', cover art by [[Pauline Baynes]])
** [[1986]]: reissued by Unicorn / Unwin Paperbacks - (cover art by [[Roger Garland]])
* [[1987]]: [[Unwin Hyman]], 1966 second edition, 16th/14th/14th impression - (cover art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]])
* [[1990]]: Isis / Clio Press, hardcover, ISBN 1850894140, ISBN 1850894191, ISBN 1850894298 - (large print edition)
** 1990-1: 1981 paperback edition, 11th/9th/8th impression - (cover art by [[Ted Nasmith]])

* [[1991]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0261102311, ISBN 026110232X, ISBN 0261102338 - (cover art by [[John Howe]])
** [[1993]]: paperback edition, ISBN 0261102354, ISBN 0261102362, ISBN 0261102370
* [[1992]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0261102923, ISBN 0261102931, ISBN 026110294X - (illustrated by [[Alan Lee]])
** [[1996]]: paperback edition, ISBN 0261103385, ISBN 0261103393, ISBN 0261103407
* 1992-1: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0261102990 (set) - (illustrated by Alan Lee, deluxe slipcase edition)
* [[1997]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0261103571, ISBN 026110358X, ISBN 0261103598 - (cover art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]])
* [[1998]]: 1991 hardcover edition, reset and issued in 1998, also issued in paperback 
* [[1999]]: 1993 paperback edition, reset in 1999 - (cover art by Geoff Taylor)
** 1999-1: 1999 paperback edition, 5th/5th/5th? impression
** 1999-2: 1999 paperback edition, 16th/21st/21st? impression

* [[2001]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0007123825, ISBN 0007123833, ISBN 0007123809 - ([[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring|film I]] tie-in edition, cover from the film)
* 2001-1: Collins, paperback, ISBN 000712970X, ISBN 0007129718, ISBN 0007129726
* [[2002]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0007136595, ISBN 0007136560, ISBN 0007136579 - (illustrated by [[Alan Lee]])
* 2002-1: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0007136633, ISBN 0007136625, ISBN 0007136617 - (large print edition)
* 2002-2: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0007149212, ISBN 0007149212, ISBN 0007149239 - ([[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|film II]] tie-in edition, cover from the film)
* [[2003]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0007171978, ISBN 0007171986, ISBN 0007171994 - ([[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|film III]] tie-in edition, cover from the film)
